Posted By: Colt McClelland
I have the following cards for trade:
OJ Mays (Spotted Tie) FR-GD
E102 Matty SGC 20 (looks much nicer)
E90-2 Hyatt SGC 40
E90-2 Maddox SGC 40
E97 Bull Durham SGC 40
E97 Hartzell SGC 50
T200 Cleveland GD

I am looking for the following:
OJ Brown's Champs - Bushong, Comiskey (plus upgrades on others)
N28 - Anson, Keefe, Kelley (plus upgrades on others)
N162 - Anson, Andrews, Caruthers (plus upgrades on others)
SCRAPPS - various players (preferably SGC graded)
D359 - any
E104-1 - Baker, Dygert, Lapp, Livingstone, Lord, Strunk
T200 - Brooklyn (NL), Detroit (AL), New York (AL), Pittsburgh (NL)
E90-1 - rare poses

If there is a possible match, please contact me at cmcclelland@kc.rr.com.    

Thanks.

Posted By: James Feagin
I have an 1887 Old Judge Emil Burch GAI 3 (St. Louis Browns).  Will trade even up for like graded Baltimore player from the same set.

James
